title: New: Cub Scout – Lost
body:
London trio **Cub Scout** have sure been busy earning their badges… sorry that’s awful.

Anyway, their latest track Lost picks up where they left off on _[Seconds](http://admin.crackintheroad.com/music/14056-new-cub-scout-seconds/)_, with it’s sparse, atmospheric vibe and haunting female vocals. There’s several moments when it threatens to turn into a rip-your-ears-off Skrillex-fans-love-it wobwobwob, yet rescues itself from the point of self destruction with it’s delicate rhythm and ethereal vibe. Sort of what might happen if **Dido** collaborated with **James Blake**, or something… Check out _Lost_ below.
